content: Click on the thread icon at the top left of the header window to toggle it on or off
creator: frisée

content: Check your SMTP Settings at Hamburger (top right)/Account Settings/Outgoing Server (SMTP) (left) If this doesn't resolve the matter, please send a screenshot of the error messages
creator: frisée
